name: Fjallraven Fjallglim Long Sleeve Shirt - Men's
description: Lock in comfort no matter where you are. The Fjallglim is made with polyester flannel that keeps you warm and wicks moisture away from your skin. Super functional as a base layer or a mid-layer for hiking, trekking or scrambling up to breezy summits.Made of polyester with insulating hollow fibres.2 chest pockets, one has a zipper to keep necessities close.Sleeves can be rolled up and kept in place with a button.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.
